org.harctoolbox.devslashlirc

Class LircHardware

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.harctoolbox.devslashlirc.LircHardware
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LircDevice

    public abstract class LircHardware
extends Object
implements Closeable
    An abstract base class for Lirc drivers and -devices.

    • Method Detail

      • loadLibrary

        public static void loadLibrary()
                        throws UnsatisfiedLinkError
        Loads the native library from a system directory. This function, or the version with argument, must be called before instantiating the class.
        Throws:
        UnsatisfiedLinkError - If loading fails

      • loadLibrary

        public static void loadLibrary(File path)
                        throws UnsatisfiedLinkError
        Loads the native library given as argument (preferred), or, if the argument is null, from a system directory. This function, or the version without argument, must be called before instantiating the class.
        Parameters:
        path - Either the path name of the library, or the path name of the containing directory. If null, use system directory.
        Throws:
        UnsatisfiedLinkError - If loading fails

      • isLibraryLoaded

        public static boolean isLibraryLoaded()
        Returns true if the native library has been successfully loaded.
        Returns:
        success (boolean)
